title: MY SOUL LONGETH FOR YOU
bible_ref: My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God... Ps 42:2
verses: My soul longeth for you=You shall answer my prayer today=You shall answer my prayer today=My soul longeth for you=You shall answer my prayer today=You shall answer my prayer today=I must touch your throne, I must receive your help=I must touch your heart, I must touch reality=You shall answer my prayer today=You shall answer my prayer today
